recipesJson.name: Cherry Cola
recipesJson.author: W3STON
recipesJson.description:
FLV root beer is probably my favorite concentrate, so I was excited when I heard they were coming out with a cola flavor.

This is a simple cherry cola recipe I threw together. The cherry base was inspired by SteamOnâ€™s Sonic Fuzz which is an amazing recipe.

Use WS-23 at desired level or not at all.
